name: Gas Bullets and My Car
description:
The world is not a nice place anymore (was it ever nice?).

Everyone wants to shoot you, unless you learn how to aim and shoot first.

And now you are out of fuel, find the gas cans in order to get out.

Controls:

WASD - Walk

RMB - Aim

LMB - Fire

F - Pick up and drop guns

E - Interact
